item.title: Khunmoon add a quote by Joel Osteen
item.description: "You must make a decision that you are going to move on. It wont happen automatically. You will have to rise up and say, ‘I don’t care how hard this is, I don’t care how disappointed I am, I’m not going to let this get the best of me. I’m moving on with my life." -- Joel Osteen

item.title: Khunmoon add a quote by Joel Osteen
item.description: "No matter how many times you get knocked down, keep getting back up. God sees your resolve. He sees your determination. And when you do everything you can do, that’s when God will step in and do what you can’t do." -- Joel Osteen

item.title: Khunmoon add a quote by Joel Osteen
item.description: "Keep doing the right. God is building character in you, and you are passing that test. Remember, the greater the struggle, the greater the reward." -- Joel Osteen

item.title: Khunmoon add a quote by Joel Osteen
item.description: "It’s vital that you accept yourself and learn to be happy with who God made you to be. If you want to truly enjoy your life, you must be at peace with yourself." -- Joel Osteen

item.title: Khunmoon add a quote by Milton Erickson
item.description: "Life will bring you pain all by itself. Your responsibility is to create joy." Milton Erickson" -- Milton Erickson

item.title: Khunmoon add a quote by Winston Churchhill
item.description: "We make a living by what we get. We make a life by what we give." -- Winston Churchhill

item.title: Khunmoon add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Khunmoon add a quote by -Nicholas Moon
item.description: "Life with love will have thorns....but Life without love will have no roses....!!" -- -Nicholas Moon
